description:
In Lawnmower game you drive lawnmower and cut grass in a big open world which contains grass, houses and other obstacles! 

Drive lawnmower in open world and cut every cuttable grass right in front of you. After cutting all grass, it will respawn - the game loop is endless.
Lawnmower has also fuel consumption mechanics. Pick-up Jerry cans and add fuel. If you run out of fuel you will respawn at the starting location.
Enjoy the game, cut all the grass and be the Lawnmower King!
name: Lawnmower Game: Next Generation
